Items.name: Rock
Items.description: A small round rock. Good for throwing!

Items.name: Tarnished Necklace
Items.description: A once-beautiful necklace, now tarnished with age. It should fetch a small sum when sold.

Items.name: Leg of Fowl
Items.description: A cooked leg of a small bird. It smells delicious.

Items.name: Cykia Dust
Items.description: A shining gold dust. It is popular among coal miners as a energizing remedy.

Items.name: Vial of Fae Blood
Items.description: A glass vial of green fluid. It is said to contain the blood of a fae. Many use it to cure all kinds of ailments.

Items.name: Scroll of Debugging
Items.description: A magical scroll said to contain knowledge of the creator.

Items.name: Rough Uncut Emerald
Items.description: A small, cloudy emerald, pulled straight from the earth. It sparkles with untapped potential.

Items.name: Rough Uncut Sapphire
Items.description: A small, cloudy sapphire, pulled straight from the earth. It sparkles with untapped potential.

Items.name: Rough Uncut Ruby
Items.description: A small, cloudy ruby, pulled straight from the earth. It sparkles with untapped potential.

Items.name: Rough Uncut Diamond
Items.description: A small, cloudy diamond, pulled straight from the earth. It sparkles with untapped potential.

Items.name: Rough Emerald
Items.description: A small emerald cut by a careful hand. Its flaws are apparent at the right angle

Items.description: A small sapphire cut by a careful hand. Its flaws are apparent at the right angle
